16  package org.apache.ibatis.cache.decorators;
17  
18  import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
19  import java.util.Map;
20  import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReadWriteLock;
21  
22  import org.apache.ibatis.cache.Cache;
23  
24  /**
25   * Lru (first in, first out) cache decorator
26   *
27   * @author Clinton Begin
28   */
29  public class LruCache implements Cache {
30  
31    private final Cache delegate;
32    private Map<Object, Object> keyMap;
33    private Object eldestKey;
34  
35    public LruCache(Cache delegate) {
36      this.delegate = delegate;
37      setSize(1024);
38    }
39  
40    @Override
41    public String getId() {
42      return delegate.getId();
43    }
44  
45    @Override
46    public int getSize() {
47      return delegate.getSize();
48    }
49  
50    public void setSize(final int size) {
51      keyMap = new LinkedHashMap<Object, Object>(size, .75F, true) {
52        private static final long serialVersionUID = 4267176411845948333L;
53  
54        protected boolean removeEldestEntry(Map.Entry<Object, Object> eldest) {
55          boolean tooBig = size() > size;
56          if (tooBig) {
57            eldestKey = eldest.getKey();
58          }
59          return tooBig;
60        }
61      };
62    }
63  
64    @Override
65    public void putObject(Object key, Object value) {
66      delegate.putObject(key, value);
67      cycleKeyList(key);
68    }
69  
70    @Override
71    public Object getObject(Object key) {
72      keyMap.get(key); //touch
73      return delegate.getObject(key);
74    }
75  
76    @Override
77    public Object removeObject(Object key) {
78      return delegate.removeObject(key);
79    }
80  
81    @Override
82    public void clear() {
83      delegate.clear();
84      keyMap.clear();
85    }
86  
87    public ReadWriteLock getReadWriteLock() {
88      return null;
89    }
90  
91    private void cycleKeyList(Object key) {
92      keyMap.put(key, key);
93      if (eldestKey != null) {
94        delegate.removeObject(eldestKey);
95        eldestKey = null;
96      }
97    }
98  
99  }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
